NARRATIONS: AMALGAMATION of MODERN TERRY TOWELS LTD ("Transferor" or "the Company") with MODERN INSULATORS LTD ("Transferee").^^As per the Scheme the MODERN INSULATORS LTD will allot to the shareholders of the Company :^^Three (3) Equity Shares of Rs 10 each for every Two (2) Equity Shares held by them in the Company (Ratio 3:2).^^REDUCTION - As per the Scheme shareholder(s) of the Company will be issued Two (2) equity share(s) of Rs 10 each for every Five (5) equity share(s) of Rs 10 each.
